room_title: Escape room "Black Hat" by The Encrypted Escape in Green Bay
review: My first time doing an escape room and my team and I just escaped from the Black Hat room! It was so much fun and I can't wait to come back and try my hand at the other challenges!

room_title: Escape room "Black Hat" by The Encrypted Escape in Green Bay
review: This place is awesome!! My friends and I did the Black Hat room. When we completed the challenge, I didn't want it to be done! I will definitely come back to try the other rooms. The service is excellent.

room_title: Escape room "Black Hat" by The Encrypted Escape in Green Bay
review: We brought our entire family here as a private party! About 18 people, and we split among the three rooms easily. I did the Black Hat room, it was a great experience and a great team building activity!! Loved it!

room_title: Escape room "Black Hat" by The Encrypted Escape in Green Bay
review: We did Black Hat and the room was so much fun! You felt like you were part of the story the whole time. I would recommend it and can't wait to do the next puzzle.

room_title: Escape room "Black Hat" by The Encrypted Escape in Green Bay
review: Played Black Hat and 221B. Both were very well designed; the rooms were spacious and beautifully themed, and the puzzles were unique, interesting, and appropriately difficult. They also have creative clue delivery mechanisms which set them apart from many other escape rooms. Staff were friendly and enthusiastic. Looking forward to playing their other rooms in the future.

room_title: Escape room "Black Hat" by The Encrypted Escape in Green Bay
review: We started with the Black Hat room and enjoyed ourselves so much we signed up for 221B! Asia our game master for the Black Hat was a great addition to the room! We definitely will come back for more!
